__pagemyself_component_add__:
Add a new block to this page
After clicking this button, click on 'Insert block here' to choose the position to insert
__pagemyself_component_block_settings__: Show a list of all blocks on website
__pagemyself_component_calendar_desc__: Display a calendar on your homepage, where you can add information to each day for your visitors. You can have mulitple calendars on different pages as well.
__pagemyself_component_calendar_internal: Internal Info (Only visible in website editor)
__pagemyself_component_calendar_predefin: Cell Color (Values that you have already used before)
__pagemyself_component_ctrl_click__: Pro Tip: Hold CTRL and right-click on any block directly on the website, to open the settings window for the block.
__pagemyself_component_jumpmark_desc__: Allow to jump to this element with a jumpark (#xxx) in pagelink. This will allow to use links in your navigation that point to this jumpmark. Mostly used for single page applications.
__pagemyself_component_jumpmark_link__: Use this URL to link to this jumpmark
__pagemyself_component_no_blocks__: You have no blocks on this page. Add some by clicking the plus symbol right next to the settings symbol.
__pagemyself_component_slideshow_desc__: An easy to use image slideshow where an user can switch between images.
__pagemyself_component_slideshow_editima: Click here to sort and add titles for selected images
__pagemyself_component_slideshow_sorting: Drag&Drop the images to the desired places
__pagemyself_component_text_default__: Your editable text is here. Click me to edit the text.
__pagemyself_component_text_desc__: Write any text in any style you want. This give you the most flexible option to add your content. You have many formating options like tables, colors, images, links, etc... Also there are a lot of predefined layout blocks you can insert, like cards, alerts, buttons, etc...
__pagemyself_component_text_help__: To add a new line without a vertical empty space, hold CTRL and hit enter, instead of just pressing Enter only
__pagemyself_editor_templates_edit_text_: You can edit this text after inserting into the website
__pagemyself_editor_templates_type_email:
In case your default e-mail app doesn't open,
please send an e-mail to {0}
__pagemyself_editor_templates_type_jumpm: You can use a jump-mark to create a link to this exact position in page. So when an user open the link with this jump-mark, the page will automatically scroll to this position.
__pagemyself_mediabrowser_deletefolder__: Delete folder including all files in it
__pagemyself_pageeditor_page_mobile__: Toggle between mobile and desktop view
__pagemyself_pageeditor_page_open__: Click here to open this website in a new tab to see your changes
__pagemyself_pageeditor_page_required__: You need to navigate to a page before you can edit the settings.
__pagemyself_pageeditor_theme_settings_d: All settings in this window are applied to the choosen theme. Changes to this settings will change appearance of all pages that use this theme.
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_flagshow_: Just in case you want to hide this entry in the navigation. This is useful because all website pages automatically have a navigation entry created. Maybe you don't want all pages in your navigation.
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_grouptitl: Fill this out, if you want to group navigation entries into a submenu with this label. The user later can expand this submenu and see all the entries with the same group label.
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_image_lab: Display this image instead of the title. The title is still required as alternative text.
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_missing__: Please choose a page or an external URL to link to
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_page_labe: Choose an existing website page to link to
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_url_exter: Or link to a free defined external url
__pagemyself_storable_naventry_url_hash_: Set a jump-mark - This must begin with #jumpto-...
__pagemyself_storable_page_password_labe: If set, an user must enter this password in order to view the page.
__pagemyself_storable_page_title_label_d: The title the appears in your browser tab and in search engine results
__pagemyself_storable_page_url_label_des:
The name that appears in your website url. Special characters are not allowed.
Empty = Homepage
__pagemyself_view_index__: PageMyself - Fast, easy and powerful website generator
__pagemyself_websitesetting_bodyhtml__: HTML Code that appears at the end of <body> tag
__pagemyself_websitesetting_favicon_desc: The tiny icon that is displayed beside the browser page title and in search engines. Should be a squared image with 512x512.
__pagemyself_websitesetting_headhtml__: HTML Code that appears inside <head> tag
__pagemyself_websitesettings_headhtml_de: Use this to including scripts, adding external stylesheets, etc...
__pagemyself_websitesettings_og_data__: This is a meta information and is used by search engines and social media representation
__pagemyself_websitesettings_search_engi: This is a meta information and is only used for search machine optimization
